Package org.cpnsim.datacenter

Interface CollaborationManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollaborationManagerSimple
public interface CollaborationManager
A class to manager the collaboration zones of the datacenters.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu

      datacenter - the datacenter to be added to the collaboration
      collaborationId - the id of the collaboration

      Parameters:
      datacenters - the collaboration map.

    • removeDatacenter

      CollaborationManager removeDatacenter(Datacenter datacenter, int collaborationId)
      Remove the datacenter from the collaboration with the given collaboration id.
      Parameters:
      datacenter - the datacenter to be removed from the collaboration
      collaborationId - the id of the collaboration

    • removeDatacenter

      CollaborationManager removeDatacenter(Datacenter datacenter)
      Remove the datacenter from all collaborations.
      Parameters:
      datacenter - the datacenter to be removed from the collaboration

    • getIsChangeCollaborationSyn

      boolean getIsChangeCollaborationSyn()
      Get whether the collaboration zones is adjusted periodically.
      Returns:
      true if the collaboration zones is adjusted periodically, false otherwise

    • setIsChangeCollaborationSyn

      CollaborationManager setIsChangeCollaborationSyn(boolean isChangeCollaborationSyn)
      Set whether the collaboration zones is adjusted periodically.
      Parameters:

    • addCenterScheduler

      CollaborationManager addCenterScheduler(InterScheduler centerScheduler)
      Add the center scheduler to the collaboration with the given collaboration id.
      Parameters:
      centerScheduler - the center scheduler to be added to the collaboration
      Returns:
      the collaboration manager

    • getCollaborationGroupQueueMap

      Map<Integer,InstanceGroupQueue> getCollaborationGroupQueueMap()
      Get the center scheduler with the given collaboration id.
      Returns:
      the center scheduler with the given collaboration id

    • getCollaborationCenterSchedulerMap

      Map<Integer,InterScheduler> getCollaborationCenterSchedulerMap()
      Get the map of the collaboration id and the center scheduler. The key is the collaboration id, and the value is the center scheduler of the collaboration with the collaboration id.
      Returns:
      the map of the collaboration id and the center scheduler

    • getCenterSchedulerBusyMap

      Map<Integer,Boolean> getCenterSchedulerBusyMap()
      Get the map of the collaboration id and the center scheduler busy status. If the value is true, the center scheduler is busy, it can not start a new scheduling. Otherwise, the center scheduler is idle.
      Returns:
      the map of the collaboration id and the center scheduler busy status

    • getDatacenterById

      Datacenter getDatacenterById(int datacenterId)
      Get the data center by the given data center id.
      Parameters:
      datacenterId - the id of the data center

    • getOnlyCollaborationId

      int getOnlyCollaborationId(int datacenterId)
      Get the only collaboration id of the data center.
      Parameters:
      datacenterId - the id of the data center
